definitions.definition: Someone who is attracted to all types of people regardless of gender.
Sexually attracted to people regardless of gender.
Sexually attracted to everyone.
Welcoming people of all sexual orientations.
Pertaining to the psychological theory of pansexualism.
A tank ship, a vessel used to transport large quantities of liquid.
A tank truck.
A fuel tanker, petrol tanker, road tanker.
A tank car
Member of a tank crew, or of an armoured unit.
A longboard.
definitions.example: I swung the tanker around just in time to take off with the lip

definitions.definition: To transport (oil, etc.) in a tanker.
(of persons, often followed by to) To act in accordance with expectations; to behave in the manner of others, especially as a result of social pressure.
(of things, situations, etc.) To be in accordance with a set of specifications or regulations, or with a policy or guideline.
To make similar in form or nature; to make suitable for a purpose; to adapt.
Tenacious, energetic, spunky.
Belligerent; prepared to stand and fight, especially in spite of relatively small stature or some other disadvantage.
Easily offended and ready to bicker.
A slow, stately Baroque dance.
The music for such a dance, often containing variations on a theme.
A formal investigation, often held before a jury, especially one into the cause of a death
An inquiry, typically into an undesired outcome
The jury hearing such an inquiry, and the result of the inquiry
Enquiry; quest; search
A person who rides a surfboard.
A person who surfs the Internet.
A duck, the surf scoter (Melanitta perspicillata).
To disturb or excite; to perturb or stir up (a person).
definitions.example: He was greatly agitated by the news.

definitions.definition: To cause to move with a violent, irregular action; to shake.
definitions.example: the wind agitates the sea

definitions.definition: To set in motion; to actuate.
To discuss or debate.
To revolve in the mind, or view in all its aspects; to consider, to devise.
definitions.example: politicians agitate desperate designs

definitions.definition: Panthera tigris, a large predatory mammal of the cat family, indigenous to Asia.
A representation of a large mythological cat, used on a coat of arms.
A servant in livery, who rides with his master or mistress.
A leopard.
A person who is very athletic during sexual intercourse.
A ferocious, bloodthirsty and audacious person.
A kind of growl or screech, after cheering.

definitions.definition: A pneumatic box or pan used in refining sugar.
A tiger moth in the family Arctiidae.
A tiger beetle.
A tiger butterfly in tribe Danaini, especially subtribe Danaina
A relatively small country or group of countries with a fast-growing economy.
A final shouted phrase, accompanied by a jump or outstretched arms, at the end of a cheer.
A police dog trained to sniff out illegal goods such as drugs or explosives.
The first element of a full name in cultures that place the given name first.
A style of composition in which one contrasting section of music is written between two similar outer sections.
A shop that sells alcoholic beverages to be drunk off the premises.
An inhabitant of the infernal regions.
Of or relating to hell, or the world of the dead; hellish.
(by extension) Of or relating to a fire or inferno.
Stygian, gloomy.
Diabolical or fiendish.
(as an expletive, not vulgar) Very annoying; damned.
An infectious illness of the larynx, especially in young children, causing respiratory difficulty.
(obsolete outside dialectal) To croak, make a hoarse noise.
A very fine, semi-opaque fabric similar to muslin, typically made of silk, wool or cotton.
A soft, light sweet or savoury mousse.
A hollandaise sauce that has been made frothy with whipped cream or egg white, served mainly with fish or asparagus.
A very thin glass for claret glasses.
Occurring, or provided for use during a flight

definitions.definition: A harbor, river, or offshore area that can accommodate a ship at anchor, either for quarantine, queuing, or discharge..
A fee charged for anchoring.
That into which something is anchored or fastened.
definitions.example: the anchorages of the Brooklyn Bridge

definitions.definition: The surgical fixation of prolapsed organs.
The act of anchoring, or the condition of lying at anchor.
The set of anchors belonging to a ship.
The retreat of a hermit, or anchorite.
Something on which one may depend for security; ground of trust.
A segment of roadway that directs vehicular traffic from a freeway onto local roads
An odometer graduated in miles.
Various former units of volume, particularly:
A former Hebrew unit of dry volume, about equal to 230 L or 6 1/2 US bushels.
A four-base hit; a home run
definitions.example: The first baseman hit a homer to lead off the ninth.

definitions.definition: A homing pigeon
definitions.example: Each of the pigeon fanciers released a homer at the same time.

definitions.definition: A person who is extremely devoted to his favorite team.
definitions.example: Joe is such a homer that he would never boo the Hometown Hobos, even if they are in last place in the league.

definitions.definition: To hit a homer; to hit a home run.
definitions.example: The Sultan of Swat homered 714 times.

definitions.definition: The state or condition of being depraved; moral debasement.
A particular depraved act or trait.
(Christian theology) Inborn corruption, entailing the belief that every facet of human nature has been polluted, defiled, and contaminated by sin.
Someone who starts something.
definitions.example: a starter on a journey

definitions.definition: Something that starts something.
definitions.example: It's small, but it's a good starter house.

definitions.definition: The first course of a meal, consisting of a small, usually savoury, dish.
(team sports) A player in the lineup of players that a team fields at the beginning of a game.
A dog that rouses game.
A short length of rope formerly used for casual chastisement in the Navy.
A railway signal controlling the starting of trains from a station or some other location, more fully called a starter signal or starting signal.
A piece done to prove possession of skill sufficient to be ranked a master.
A piece of quality, indicative of having been made by a master; a masterpiece.
An act of primary importance.
A main drain or irrigation channel.
A diplomat's immunity to prosecution and/or litigation under local law.
(of a man) Honourable, especially to women; gallant.
Involving chivalry.
To investigate something, or solve a problem using brainstorming.
To participate in a brainstorming session.
A method of problem solving in which members of a group contribute ideas spontaneously.
A bush, Rubus spectabilis, found on the Pacific coast of North America.
The fruit from this bush, similar in appearance and texture to the blackberry and raspberry.
A lazy and slovenly person.
A lazy and obese person.
The business of selling products or services by making unsolicited telephone calls to potential customers.
definitions.example: The newspaper started a telemarketing campaign to boost its subscriptions by calling non-subscribers.

definitions.definition: A UFO.
To increase in number or spread rapidly; to multiply.
definitions.example: The flowers proliferated rapidly all spring.

definitions.definition: A bun, made with yeast and containing spices, currants and candied fruit, with a cross marked on the top, traditionally eaten on Good Friday in Christian countries.
A genre of classical music written for a small group of instruments
A reddish-brown color.
A coarse, reddish-brown, homespun fabric; clothes made with such fabric.
A variety of apple with rough, russet-colored skin.
A variety of potato with rough, dark gray-brown skin.
(of apples, pears, etc.) To develop reddish-brown spots; to cause russeting.
Having a reddish-brown color.
Gray or ash-colored.
Rustic, homespun, coarse, plain.
The condition of leather when its treatment is complete, but it is not yet colored (stained) and polished.
Having a rough skin that is reddish-brown or greyish; russeted.
A person who intentionally causes the destruction of property in order to hinder the efforts of his/her enemy.
Hyperextension exercise
Hyperspace
Hyperactive
Energetic; overly diligent
A wrestler who uses the hipe technique.
A large wasp, of the genus Vespa, having a brown-and-yellow-striped body and the ability to inflict a serious sting.
A person who pesters with petty but ceaseless attacks.

A moving walkway; a slow conveyor belt that transports people horizontally or on an incline in a similar manner to an escalator.
Any sport played on or in water; such as swimming or water skiing.
Any sexual practice involving urine or urination; urolagnia.
In a precarious manner; dangerously
A telegraph post
To declare something holy, or make it holy by some procedure.
(specifically) To ordain as a bishop.
Consecrated; devoted; dedicated; sacred.
A contest.
To fight for superiority; to contend; to compete eagerly so as to gain something.

definitions.definition: To rival (something), etc.
To do or produce in emulation, competition, or rivalry; to put in competition; to bandy.
To stake; to wager.
To stake a sum of money upon a hand of cards, as in the old game of gleek. See revie.
(grammar) A grammatical role of a ditransitive verb that manifests a secondary or passive participant in an action, often a recipient or goal.
(grammar, in languages with case distinctions also) The object of a monotransitive verb that it is not in the accusative case, especially when it is in the dative case.
A sealed cooking vessel that allows cooking in greater than atmospheric pressure and at a temperature above the boiling point of water.
A stressful situation that is liable to erupt.
To cause to be bitter.
A multilevel parking garage.
An act which belittles; disparagement.
The act of derogating; the temporary or partial nullification of a law.
Designer.
Hairdresser.
A writer or speaker distinguished for excellence or individuality of style; one who cultivates, or is a master or critic of, literary style.
An artist who has a particular distinctive style.
A very pungent aromatic spice, the unexpanded flower bud of the clove tree.
A clove tree, of the species Syzygium aromaticum (syn. Caryophyllus aromaticus), native to the Moluccas (Indonesian islands), which produces the spice.
An old English measure of weight, containing 7 pounds (3.2 kg), i.e. half a stone.
Any one of the separate bulbs that make up the larger bulb of garlic.
To split or sever something with, or as if with, a sharp instrument.
definitions.example: The wings cleaved the foggy air.

definitions.definition: To break a single crystal (such as a gemstone or semiconductor wafer) along one of its more symmetrical crystallographic planes (often by impact), forming facets on the resulting pieces.
To make or accomplish by or as if by cutting.

definitions.definition: To split (a complex molecule) into simpler molecules.
To split.
Of a crystal, to split along a natural plane of division.
A narrow valley with steep sides, used in areas of North America first settled by the Dutch
A person who cares for one or more babies or children for a short period of time in place of their legal guardians.

definitions.definition: The fruit of a non-spicy cultivar of pepper, Capsicum annuum, marketed in green-, red-, yellow- and orange-skinned varieties.
To make something happen suddenly and quickly.

definitions.definition: To throw an object or person from a great height.
To send violently into a certain state or condition.

definitions.definition: To come out of a liquid solution into solid form.
definitions.example: Adding the acid will cause the salt to precipitate.

definitions.definition: To separate a substance out of a liquid solution into solid form.
To have water in the air fall to the ground, for example as rain, snow, sleet, or hail; be deposited as condensed droplets.
definitions.example: It will precipitate tomorrow, but we don't know whether as rain or snow.

definitions.definition: To cause (water in the air) to condense or fall to the ground.
To fall headlong.
To act too hastily; to be precipitous.
Headlong; falling steeply or vertically.
Very steep; precipitous.
With a hasty impulse; hurried; headstrong.
Moving with excessive speed or haste.

definitions.definition: Performed very rapidly or abruptly.
A product resulting from a process, event, or course of action
A solid that exits the liquid phase of a solution
A female sibling sharing a single parent.
An authoritative principle, belief or statement of opinion, especially one considered to be absolutely true and indisputable, regardless of evidence or without evidence to support it.
A doctrine (or set of doctrines) relating to matters such as morality and faith, set forth authoritatively by a religious organization or leader.
definitions.example: In the Catholic Church, new dogmas can only be declared by the pope after the extremely rare procedure ex cathedra to make them part of the official faith.

definitions.definition: A utensil used to crush garlic
One who perpetrates; especially, one who commits an offence or crime.
(physical) To move, or be moved, away.
To direct (one's eyes, gaze etc.).
To add up (a column of figures, accounts etc.); cross-cast refers to adding up a row of figures.

To perform, bring forth (a magical spell or enchantment).
To throw (light etc.) on or upon something, or in a given direction.
To give birth to (a child) prematurely; to miscarry.

To deposit (a ballot or voting paper); to formally register (one's vote).
To change a variable type from, for example, integer to real, or integer to text.

To set (a bone etc.) in a cast.
To open a circle in order to begin a spell or meeting of witches.
To broadcast.

A manufacturing process using a mold.
An object made in a mold.

A magic charm or spell.
Supernatural skill or luck.
Personal magnetism; charm.
Sex appeal; sex drive.
Illegal drugs.

A soft, waxy, silvery reactive metal that is never found unbound in nature; an element (symbol K) with an atomic number of 19 and atomic weight of 39.0983. The symbol is derived from the Latin kalium.
A single atom of this element.
A tall, square, tapered, stone monolith topped with a pyramidal point, frequently used as a monument.
(of a dragonfly) To adopt the obelisk posture; to point the tip of the abdomen towards the sun.

A symbol resembling a horizontal line (–), sometimes together with one or two dots (for example, ⨪ or ÷), which was used in ancient manuscripts and texts to mark a word or passage as doubtful or spurious, or redundant; an obelisk.

A dagger symbol (†), which is used in printed matter as a reference mark to refer the reader to a footnote, marginal note, etc.; beside a person's name to indicate that the person is deceased; or beside a date to indicate that it is a person's death date; an obelisk.
(used with at, upon or infinitive) To urge on with cries of loo or by other shouting or outcry.
A cry to urge on hunting dogs.
A meaningless chant or refrain.
A trick-taking card game popular in 17th-century England, where each player is dealt three or five cards.
The penalty paid to the pool in lanterloo for breaking certain rules or failing to take a trick.
An act that prompts such a penalty.
A game of lanterloo.
Any group of people.
To beat in the card game lanterloo.
To pay a penalty to the pool for breaking certain rules or failing to take a trick in lanterloo.
To pay any penalty to any community.
A half-mask, particularly those velvet half-masks fashionable in the 17th century as a means of protecting women's complexion from the sun.

A lavatory: a room used for urination and defecation.

A metaphor which consists in treating inanimate objects or concepts as if they were human beings, for instance having thoughts or feelings.
The art or science of making and flying aircraft.
Flying, operating, or operation of aircraft.

Aircraft
A cocktail made with gin, maraschino liqueur, crème de violette and lemon juice
One who lounges; an idler.
A chair made for lounging.
To change to a tan colour due to exposure to the sun.

To spank or beat.
Having a suntan.

An unauthorized recording, e.g., of a live concert.

A play in which the quarterback fakes a handoff, conceals the ball against his hip, and rolls out.

To engage in bootlegging.

The state or quality of being asexual, that is:

A house provided for a clergyman; a manse.
A stopping-place during a journey; a stage.
An astrological house; a station of the moon.
One of twenty-eight sections of the sky.

Any of the branches of the Rastafari movement.
To writhe with agony; to suffer violent anguish.
To struggle; to wrestle; to strive desperately, whether mentally or physically.
The act of one who agonizes.
Causing physical or mental agony.

A native or resident of the American state of Louisiana.
A retort or still having a curved tube or tubes leading back from the head to the body for continuous condensation and redistillation.

An area of hostile territory at the end of a rail line that, when captured, serves for the continuous movement into position of further troops and material.
Any of several perennial herbs, of the genus Typha, that have long flat leaves, and grow in marshy places

To cover with stone, concrete, blacktop or other solid covering, especially to aid travel.
To pave the way for; to make easy and smooth.
Not fancied.
Subject to frequent changes in direction.
(of a person's eyes) Moving from one object to another, not looking directly and steadily at the person with whom one is speaking.
Having the appearance of being dishonest, criminal or unreliable.

definitions.definition: Resourceful; full of, or ready with, shifts or expedients.
Sapsucking pest insect of the superfamily Aphidoidea; an aphidian.
To steal an automobile forcibly from (someone).

definitions.definition: Of, or characterized by adultery.
